name: MLObjectDetectorMetrics
desc: Metrics you use to evaluate an object detector’s performance.

items.name: init(averagePrecision: (variedIoU: [String : Double], IoU50: [String : Double]), meanAveragePrecision: (variedIoU: Double, IoU50: Double))
items.desc: Creates metrics for an object detector given an average precision and a mean average precision.

items.name: var averagePrecision: (variedIoU: [String : Double], IoU50: [String : Double])
items.desc: Two dictionaries of average precisions at different threshholds.

items.name: var meanAveragePrecision: (variedIoU: Double, IoU50: Double)
items.desc: Two mean-average precisions at different threshholds.

items.name: var isValid: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the object detector model was able to calculate metrics.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: The underlying error present when the metrics are invalid.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the object detector metrics.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the object detector metrics that’s suitable for output during debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the object detector metrics shown in a playground.
